attributes.action: Put A Stop To The Mass Building That Is Destroying Our Environment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In my little town and in towns and cities across the country the landscape is being blighted by the mass building of houses & offices etc, often on land that was previously green and beautiful. No amount of energy consumption, recycling and other 'green' measures can replace the benefit we get from our trees and green land.
